column1: Table 6-15:  Non-CO2 Emissions from Forest Fires (MMT CO2 Eq.)a

column2: Note: Totals may not sum due to independent rounding
a These estimates include Non-CO2 Emissions from Forest Fires on Forest Land Remaining Forest Land and Land Converted to Forest Land.
b Some fire data for 2018 and all of 2019 were unavailable when these estimates were summarized; therefore 2017 or 2018, the most recent available estimate, is applied to 2019.
